com.tumblr.backboard.imitator

Class Imitator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.Imitator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventImitator, SpringImitator

    public abstract class Imitator
extends Object
    Perturbs a Spring based on some other source. mapToSpring(float) controls how the source value maps to the spring. Track and follow strategies are hints to subclasses as to the desired behavior of the mapping.

    Created by ericleong on 5/16/14.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FOLLOW_EXACT
      Map the imitatee to the current value of the spring.
      static int FOLLOW_SPRING
      Map the imitatee to the end value of the spring.
      protected int mFollowStrategy
      Whether or not the spring will simply connect the object to the property we are imitating.
      protected double mRestValue
      The desired rest value of the spring when not being perturbed.
      protected Spring mSpring
      The spring to perturb.
      protected int mTrackStrategy
      Whether or not the spring will simply connect the object to the property we are imitating.
      static int TRACK_ABSOLUTE
      Directly map the imitatee to the spring.
      static int TRACK_DELTA
      Map the change in the imitatee to the spring.

      • Imitator

        protected Imitator(double restValue,
        int trackStrategy,
        int followStrategy)
        Intended to be used as part of a builder. The spring must be set with setSpring(Spring).
        Parameters:
        restValue - the rest value for the spring.
        trackStrategy - the tracking strategy.
        followStrategy - the follow strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • mapToSpring

        protected abstract double mapToSpring(float motionValue)
        Parameters:
        motionValue - Maps the value we are tracking to the value of the spring.
        Returns:
        the new end value of the spring. If set to FOLLOW_EXACT, it is also the current value of the spring.
